opportunity.heading: Opportunity & Funding
opportunity.ask: We are raising SAR 10,000,000 to scale nationwide.
opportunity.oneLiner: Equipment + AI smart irrigation with localized service and fast delivery.

items.title: Geographic Expansion
items.body: Showrooms in Riyadh, Jeddah, and Dammam for direct sales and rapid logistics support.
items.details: Build immersive showrooms with live demos, local inventory, and service teams to accelerate conversion and retention.

items.title: Production Line Expansion
items.body: Manufacture pasteurizers and dairy churners to serve customer demand with integrated solutions.
items.details: Invest in localized manufacturing, QA labs, and supplier tooling to unlock healthy margins and resilient supply.

items.title: AI Smart Irrigation Bundles
items.body: Sensors + controller + SaaS for insights, alerts, and lower water usage.
items.details: Deploy adaptive irrigation powered by field data, bilingual dashboards, and proactive agronomist guidance.

items.title: Enter Animal Health
items.body: High-quality animal vaccines via strategic partnerships to unlock a vital new revenue stream.
items.details: Secure distribution alliances, training, and cold-chain capabilities to support farms at scale.

items.title: Brand Strengthening
items.body: Launch branded agriculture and livestock toolkits to cement us as the first-choice destination.
items.details: Create signature kits, multimedia storytelling, and community programs to amplify the Green Generation brand.

steps.text: Green Generation launched with a clear vision to close the technology gap for Saudi farms.

steps.title: Record growth & proven profitability
steps.text: With SAR 50K+ revenue and 46% margin, we validated the model and are ready to scale.
